host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser Azure VPN Gateway via l'API}
{EN: Template to check Azure VPN Gateway service using API}
host_templates.alias: Template to check Azure VPN Gateway service using API
host_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Network-VpnGateway

information.author: Centreon

description.value:
**Plugin pack to monitor Microsoft Azure VPN Gateway using Azure CLI or RestAPI.**

Available host templates and related services:

|Cloud-Azure-Network-VpnGateway|
|---|
|Site-Traffic|
|Tunnel-Traffic|
|Vpn-Gateway-Status|
|Health|

This pack provides a host discovery rule.

**Plugin pack pour superviser Microsoft Azure VPN Gateway via la CLI ou la RestAPI Azure.**

Modèles d\'hôte disponibles et leurs services :

|Cloud-Azure-Network-VpnGateway|
|---|
|Site-Traffic|
|Tunnel-Traffic|
|Vpn-Gateway-Status|
|Health|

Ce pack fournit une règle de découverte d\'hôte.

information.monitoring_procedure:
# The documentation page of this Plugin-Pack requires a newer version of the Plugin Pack Manager module:

* 19.04.2 or later
* 19.10.1 or later
* 20.04.0 or later

# The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: Azure VPN Gateway
